title: Loose Tooth
description: Losing baby teeth is a rite of passage that most children relish. Loose Tooth depicts a young boy imagining various scenarios that could result in his finally losing his tooth. The comical illustrations enliven the story, and will have students laughing out loud as you teach them lessons about characters and nouns.
meta: expect, lose, tooth, tooth fairy, wiggly, wonder
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Story Elements : Identify and describe characters
Variant Vowel Sounds : Discriminate variant vowel /oo/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word my

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
